Interceptor

2022 | 1h 38m | Action

The last officer standing on a remote missile defense base wages the battle of her life against terrorists aiming 16 stolen nuclear weapons at the US.

Starring:Elsa Pataky,Luke Bracey,Aaron Glenane

Watch all you want.

Elsa Pataky fights the good fight opposite Luke Bracey in this explosive action thriller from director Matthew Reilly.
